statements: SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date FROM reservations WHERE party_size > 5;
SELECT reservation_date, reservation_time FROM reservations WHERE table_number = 10;
SELECT reservation_id, party_size, customer_name FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-12-25';
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE party_size < 3 ORDER BY table_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, party_size FROM reservations WHERE party_size > 4 ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_time FROM reservations WHERE table_number = 5 AND party_size = 2;
SELECT * FROM reservations ORDER BY customer_name ASC, reservation_date DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, party_size, reservation_date FROM reservations WHERE reservation_time BETWEEN '18:00:00' AND '20:00:00';
SELECT * FROM dining_tables;
SELECT table_name, seats_capacity FROM dining_tables WHERE seats_capacity > 4;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT guest_name, guest_contact, party_size FROM reservations WHERE party_size >= 5;
SELECT table_id, table_name, seats_capacity FROM dining_tables ORDER BY table_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM dining_tables;
SELECT table_name, seats_capacity FROM dining_tables ORDER BY seats_capacity DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, guest_name, reservation_time FROM reservations WHERE party_size > 4 ORDER BY reservation_time ASC;
SELECT reservations.*, dining_tables.table_name FROM reservations JOIN dining_tables ON reservations.table_id = dining_tables.table_id WHERE guest_contact LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT COUNT(reservation_id) AS total_reservations, SUM(party_size) AS total_guests FROM reservations;
SELECT * FROM dining_tables;
SELECT table_number, seating_capacity FROM dining_tables WHERE table_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM reservations ORDER BY reservation_time DESC;
SELECT seating_capacity, table_number FROM dining_tables WHERE seating_capacity > 4;
SELECT customer_name FROM reservations WHERE reservation_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM dining_tables WHERE table_number > 5 ORDER BY table_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_time < NOW() ORDER BY reservation_time;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) FROM reservations GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT d.table_number, COUNT(r.reservation_id) FROM dining_tables d LEFT JOIN reservations r ON d.table_id = r.table_id GROUP BY d.table_number;
SELECT * FROM seating_optimization WHERE optimize_at_time > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY optimize_at_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM TableA;
SELECT table_name, capacity FROM TableA WHERE capacity > 5;
SELECT guest_name, party_size, reservation_date FROM TableB ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT table_id, reservation_id, seating_time FROM TableD WHERE seating_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM TableC WHERE waiter_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM TableA
SELECT table_name, capacity FROM TableA WHERE table_id = 1
SELECT guest_name, party_size FROM TableB ORDER BY reservation_date DESC, reservation_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT table_name, capacity, reservation_date, reservation_time, guest_name, party_size FROM TableA JOIN TableB ON TableA.table_id = TableB.table_id
SELECT waiter_id, waiter_name FROM TableC WHERE waiter_id = 2 ORDER BY waiter_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT * FROM seating_assignments WHERE assigned_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT customer_id, reservation_id FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT table_id, table_number, capacity FROM dining_tables ORDER BY table_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM dining_tables;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT table_number, capacity FROM dining_tables WHERE capacity > 4;
SELECT reservations.reservation_date, seating_history.seated_time FROM reservations JOIN seating_history ON reservations.reservation_id = seating_history.reservation_id;
